original_text: Fix pieces of cloth on its two edges. These will go over the priest's shoulders to join the front and the back parts of the ephod.
korean_text: 그것에 어깨받이 둘을 달아 그 두 끝을 이어지게 하고

sentences.original_text: Fix pieces of cloth on its two edges
These will go over the priest's shoulders
sentences.korean_translation: 이것들은 제사장의 어깨 위에 놓일 것이며

sentences.original_text: to join the front and the back parts of the ephod
